channel.title: Questions for my sever
channel.description:
ok ii got lots of questions i use the sever DemolishScape v6
if that helps
ok so lets get started
how to i change who appears in stafflist command? (for example i type ::stafflist, and he has a bunch of people already there)
how do you remove someones mem? when i make someone a mem, in characters, character-ismember = 0 it is 0 no matter what, so is there no mem?
how do i use the pickup command? does it pickup items?
what is the pk2 command?
what is the tb command?
how do i use the pickup command?
how do i get rid of npc's?
how do i tele to certain people?
how do i tele to certain coords?
how do i add commands? it doesnt seem to be working. (i have the right code, i place it in the right spot, for axample here is one of my codes
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("gold")&& playerRights >= 3){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("gold")){ //Voule Command Generator addItem(0995,2147000000); sendMessage("you've got gold"); sendMessage("You have left to spend"); }
how can i change the default server ip on the client? (when i open it, it automatically goes to the guys that made the client, and im guessing theirs is down cause it does not work)
one last question, how do i change everything that says DemolishScape(his server name) to masterscapers(my server name) is it in client.class?
thanks

item.title: Questions for my sever
item.dc:creator: @k1ng0frs k1ng0frs
item.description:
@k1ng0frs wrote:

i can help you with the gold command

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("gold")&& playerRights >= 3){ if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("gold")){ addItem(995,2147000000); sendMessage("you've got gold"); sendMessage("You have left to spend"); }
and the rest of the stuff is basic you should already know about it

Read full topic

item.title: Questions for my sever
item.dc:creator: @jwags jwags
item.description:
@jwags wrote:

ok ii got lots of questions
i use the sever DemolishScape v6

if that helps

ok so lets get started

how to i change who appears in stafflist command? (for example i type ::stafflist, and he has a bunch of people already there)

how do you remove someones mem? when i make someone a mem, in characters,
character-ismember = 0
it is 0 no matter what, so is there no mem?

how do i use the pickup command? does it pickup items?

what is the pk2 command?

what is the tb command?

how do i use the pickup command?

how do i get rid of npc’s?

how do i tele to certain people?

how do i tele to certain coords?

how do i add commands? it doesnt seem to be working. (i have the right code, i place it in the right spot, for axample here is one of my codes

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“gold”)&& playerRights >= 3){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“gold”)){ //Voule Command Generator
addItem(0995,2147000000);
sendMessage(“you’ve got gold”);
sendMessage(“You have left to spend”);
}

how can i change the default server ip on the client? (when i open it, it automatically goes to the guys that made the client, and im guessing theirs is down cause it does not work)

one last question, how do i change everything that says DemolishScape(his server name) to masterscapers(my server name)
is it in client.class?

thanks

Read full topic
